It provides a wide range of components and utilities to help developers create user-friendly interfaces. Handling user inputs is a common requirement in web development, and Bootstrap provides several options to handle various types of user inputs. This documentation will guide you through the process of handling user inputs using Bootstrap 5.3. ### Objective and Scope The objective of this documentation is to provide step-by-step instructions on how to handle user inputs using Bootstrap 5.3. It covers various types of user inputs, such as forms, buttons, checkboxes, radio buttons, dropdowns, and more.
